name: Ogre, Alleybasher
description: The Alleybasher Ogre is a large, chaotic evil giant known for its intimidating presence and brute strength. It wears studded leather armor and exhibits a raw, powerful build.
memorable: The Alleybasher's ability to knock opponents prone and blind them with a cloud of sand and rocks makes it a dangerous foe.
goals: Typically seeks to impose its will through intimidation and overwhelming strength, often working in service of a more intelligent leader.
relations: May encounter other ogres or be allied with less intelligent giants and chaotic creatures.
environment: Usually found in urban areas, specifically alleys or ruins, where it can leverage its imposing figure.
strengths: High Strength score enables powerful melee attacks and damage output, along with a good pool of hit points.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores suggest a lack of strategic thinking and social finesse.
attacks: Can make two powerful fist attacks or throw bricks to engage enemies at range, adding to its brute force tactics.
most_powerful_ability: Handful of Sandy Rocks allows it to hinder multiple foes with blinding sand and bludgeoning damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision to see in darkness up to 60 feet.
skills: Has a poor perception score of -2, making it notably unobservant.
additional_information: Uses Strength modifier for Intimidation checks.
Can borrow saving throw modifiers from superiors.
Capable of delivering devastating melee attacks.
Can knock enemies prone with successful attacks.
Intimidating Rebuff can disrupt enemy attacks.
test_queries: large intimidating giant with powerful melee attacks
chaotic evil ogre that knocks enemies prone
brute strength giant using throwing bricks
ogre that blinds foes with sand and rocks
enforcer ogre working for a boss
